name: Roll Off The Dice
description:
You are trapped in hell! A prisoner of the nasty demons! The only way out is through the path of dice! Tilt the dice with your mouse to roll off one onto the next!

It's short, sweet, hard, fun and full of physics based gameplay!

There are some bugs as jam games usually have. If the game doesn't restart on its own, just refresh the page.

Made in 48 hou.. Um.. 50 hours!

Credits: Programming, art, music, sounds made by Oliver Eriksson aka BATTLE LAB
